mapper.select: SELECT t.member_id FROM RESERVATION r JOIN TRIP_DAY td ON r.trip_day_id = td.trip_day_id JOIN TRIP t ON td.trip_id = t.trip_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}

SELECT rr.rest_res_id AS restResId, 'RESTAURANT' AS type, rr.reservation_id AS reservationId, rr.rest_id AS restId, ri.rest_name AS restName, ri.address, td.day AS date, CAST(rts.res_time AS TIME) AS time, rr.res_num AS resNum, rr.status FROM REST_RES rr JOIN TRIP_DAY td ON rr.trip_day_id = td.trip_day_id JOIN REST_TIME_SLOT rts ON rr.rest_time_id = rts.rest_time_id JOIN RESTAURANT_INFO ri ON rr.rest_id = ri.rest_id WHERE rr.rest_res_id = #{restResId}

SELECT rr.rest_res_id AS restResId, 'RESTAURANT' AS type, rr.reservation_id AS reservationId, rr.rest_id AS restId, ri.rest_name AS restName, ri.address, td.day AS date, CAST(rts.res_time AS TIME) AS time, rr.res_num AS resNum, rr.status FROM REST_RES rr JOIN RESTAURANT_INFO ri ON rr.rest_id = ri.rest_id JOIN TRIP_DAY td ON rr.trip_day_id = td.trip_day_id JOIN REST_TIME_SLOT rts ON rr.rest_time_id = rts.rest_time_id WHERE rr.reservation_id = #{reservationId}

SELECT ra.accom_res_id AS accomResId, 'ACCOMMODATION' AS type, ra.reservation_id AS reservationId, ra.accom_id AS accomId, ai.hotel_name AS hotelName, ai.address, ra.room_type AS roomType, ra.checkin_day AS checkinDay, ra.checkout_day AS checkoutDay, ra.guests, ai.location, ra.status FROM ACCOM_RES ra JOIN ACCOMMODATION_INFO ai ON ra.accom_id = ai.accom_id WHERE ra.accom_res_id = #{accomResId}

SELECT tr.tran_res_id AS tranResId, 'TRANSPORT' AS type, tr.reservation_id AS reservationId, tr.transport_id AS transportId, ti.train_no AS trainNo, ti.departure_name AS departureName, ti.arrival_name AS arrivalName, ti.departure_time AS departureTime, ti.arrival_time AS arrivalTime, tr.seat_room_no AS seatRoomNo, tr.seat_number AS seatNumber, tr.seat_type AS seatType, tr.status, tr.booked_at AS bookedAt FROM TRAN_RES tr JOIN TRANSPORT_INFO ti ON tr.transport_id = ti.transport_id WHERE tr.tran_res_id = #{tranResId}
